title: Scott Blum Edit
description: Our friends at Mammoth enlightened us with Scott Blum's edit for "Another Day in Paradise". See, Blum didn't mention he'd be filming last season. He practiced what he preaches and let his riding do the talking. Have a look and see what we found out.

asset.author: Volcom
asset.hookText: Our friends at Mammoth enlightened us with Scott Blum's edit for "Another Day in Paradise". See, Blum didn't mention he'd be filming last season. He practiced what he preaches and let his riding do the talking. Have a look and see what we found out.
